info.name: MediQueue (Sevo)
info.description: Complete API collection for MediQueue - Clinic Queue Management System

request.description: Register a new patient account with patient-specific fields (date of birth, gender, blood type, emergency contact)

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:
{
  "email": "dr.ahmed@clinic.com",
  "displayName": "Dr. Ahmed Hassan",
  "phoneNumber": "+201234567890",
  "password": "Clinic@123",
  "doctorName": "Dr. Ahmed Hassan",
  "specialty": "Cardiology",
  "description": "Experienced cardiologist with 15 years of practice",
  "slotDurationMinutes": 30,
  "country": "Egypt",
  "city": "Cairo",
  "area": "Nasr City",
  "street": "Abbas El Akkad Street",
  "building": "Building 25",
  "addressNotes": "Next to City Stars Mall, 3rd floor",
  "additionalPhones": ["+201987654321", "+201555666777"]
}

request.description: Register a new clinic account with complete clinic profile, address, and additional phone numbers

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:
{
  "email": "dr.ahmed@clinic.com",
  "displayName": "Dr. Ahmed Hassan",
  "phoneNumber": "+201234567890",

  "city": "Cairo",
  "area": "Nasr City",
  "street": "Abbas El Akkad Street",
  "building": "Building 25",
  "addressNotes": "Next to City Stars Mall",
  "additionalPhones": ["+201987654321"]
}

request.description: Legacy registration endpoint (backward compatible). Role must be 'Patient' or 'Clinic'

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Verify email address with OTP code sent during registration
Resend verification OTP to email. Rate limited to 60 seconds between requests

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns JWT token. Email must be verified before login

response.name: Email Not Verified

request.description: Get current authenticated user information. Requires valid JWT token
Logout current user. Performs server-side session cleanup
Request password reset. Sends OTP to email for password reset flow

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Verify OTP code for password reset. Returns reset token if successful
Reset password using the reset token obtained from OTP verification
Resend OTP for password reset. Rate limited to 60 seconds between requests
Check if an email address is already registered in the system
Get current user's profile information. Requires authentication
Update current user's profile information. Requires authentication
Get all addresses for current user. Requires authentication

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "firstName": "John",
 "lastName": "Doe",
    "street": "123 Main Street",
    "city": "Cairo",

    "zipCode": "11511",

  },

  }
]

request.description: Create a new address for current user. Requires authentication
Update an existing address. Requires authentication
Delete an address. Requires authentication
Get a fresh JWT token for the current authenticated user
Book a new appointment at a clinic. Requires Patient role authentication. Automatically assigns queue number based on existing appointments

response.name: Clinic Not Available

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific appointment including clinic details, address, phones, and queue information

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "clinicId": 1,
  "clinicName": "Dr. Ahmed Hassan Clinic",
  "doctorName": "Dr. Ahmed Hassan",
  "specialty": "Cardiology",
  "address": {
    "country": "Egypt",
    "city": "Cairo",
    "area": "Nasr City",
    "street": "Abbas El Akkad Street",
    "building": "Building 25",
    "addressNotes": "Next to City Stars Mall, 3rd floor"
  },
  "phones": [
    {
      "phoneNumber": "+201234567890"
    },
    {
    "phoneNumber": "+201987654321"
    }
  ],
  "patientId": 1,
  "appointmentDate": "2024-02-15T10:00:00",
  "queueNumber": 5,
  "status": 1,
  "statusName": "Booked",
  "estimatedWaitMinutes": 120,
  "currentQueueNumber": 2,
  "peopleAhead": 3,
  "createdAt": "2024-02-14T15:30:00"
}

request.description: Cancel an appointment. Requires Patient role. Can only cancel your own appointments

response.name: Cannot Cancel

request.description: Update appointment status. Requires Clinic role. Status values: 1=Booked, 2=InProgress, 3=Delayed, 4=Canceled, 5=Completed
Mark appointment as in progress. Requires Clinic role. Updates appointment status to InProgress
Mark appointment as completed. Requires Clinic role. Updates appointment status to Completed
Mark appointment as delayed. Requires Clinic role. Updates appointment status to Delayed

query.description: Date to call next patient for (YYYY-MM-DD format)

request.description: Call the next patient in the queue for a specific date. Requires Clinic role. Marks the next booked appointment as in progress

query.description: Date to get queue for (YYYY-MM-DD format)

request.description: Get clinic queue details for a specific date. Requires Clinic role. Returns queue statistics and list of all appointments

request.description: Submit a rating for a clinic. Requires Patient role authentication. Rating must be between 1-5. Patient must have completed appointment with the clinic to rate

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "id": 15,
  "clinicId": 1,
  "patientId": 1,
  "patientName": "John Doe",
  "rating": 5,
  "review": "Excellent doctor! Very professional and caring. The clinic is clean and well-organized.",
  "createdAt": "2024-02-14T16:30:00"
}

response.name: No Completed Appointment
Already Rated

request.description: Update an existing rating. Requires Patient role authentication. Can only update own ratings. Rating must be between 1-5

item.name: Get Working Day by Day of Week

request.description: Get working day schedule for a specific day. Requires Clinic role authentication. DayOfWeek: 0=Sunday, 1=Monday, 2=Tuesday, 3=Wednesday, 4=Thursday, 5=Friday, 6=Saturday
Bulk update all working days at once. Requires Clinic role authentication. Must provide all 7 days. DayOfWeek: 0=Sunday, 1=Monday, 2=Tuesday, 3=Wednesday, 4=Thursday, 5=Friday, 6=Saturday

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "dayOfWeek": 0,
    "dayName": "Sunday",
    "startTime": "09:00:00",
    "endTime": "17:00:00",
    "isClosed": false
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
 "dayOfWeek": 1,
 "dayName": "Monday",
    "startTime": "09:00:00",
    "endTime": "17:00:00",
    "isClosed": false
  },
  {
    "id": 3,
    "dayOfWeek": 2,
    "dayName": "Tuesday",
    "startTime": "09:00:00",
    "endTime": "17:00:00",
    "isClosed": false
  },
  {
    "id": 4,
    "dayOfWeek": 3,
    "dayName": "Wednesday",
    "startTime": "09:00:00",
    "endTime": "17:00:00",
    "isClosed": false
  },
  {
    "id": 5,
  "dayOfWeek": 4,
    "dayName": "Thursday",
    "startTime": "09:00:00",
    "endTime": "17:00:00",
    "isClosed": false
  },
  {
  "id": 6,
    "dayOfWeek": 5,
    "dayName": "Friday",
    "startTime": "00:00:00",
    "endTime": "00:00:00",
    "isClosed": true
  },
  {
    "id": 7,
    "dayOfWeek": 6,
    "dayName": "Saturday",
    "startTime": "10:00:00",
    "endTime": "14:00:00",
    "isClosed": false
  }
]

response.name: Invalid Time Range

request.description: Update a specific working day. Requires Clinic role authentication. Can update working hours or mark day as closed
Get all exception dates (holidays/closures) for the current clinic. Requires Clinic role authentication

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Add an exception date (holiday/closure) for the clinic. Requires Clinic role authentication. Exception date must be in the future
Update an existing exception date. Requires Clinic role authentication. Can update the date or reason
Delete an exception date. Requires Clinic role authentication
Check if a clinic is available on a specific date. Public endpoint - no authentication required. Returns false if day is closed or is an exception date
Get the daily capacity (max appointments) for a clinic on a specific date. Public endpoint - no authentication required. Capacity is calculated based on working hours and slot duration
